body:
Hi I'm Carmel and i recently got jr mod. (few months ago) so ask me anything! p.s




1) Whats your (full) name? dux hax
2) How old are you? 32
3) Whats your Birthday? birthday
4) What starsign does that make it? birthday star
5) Whats your favourite colour? maroon
6) Whats your lucky number? 7
7) Do you have any pets? pet duck
8) Where are you from? kanada
9) How tall are you? short
10) What shoe size are you? xsmall
11) How many pairs of shoes do you own? 2many
12) If you were prime miniser/ruler of the world what laws would you make? minister* 
13) If you were a super hero what powers would you have? starbucks
14) and what would your hero name be? starbucks 
15) and what outfit would you wear? starbucks
16) What was your last dream about? starbucks
17) What would you do if you won the lottery? starbucks
18) Would you like to build/design your own house? starbucks
19) Which form of public transport do you prefer? starbcuks
20) What talents do you have? starbucks
21) Can you juggle? no
22) Can you solve a rubix cube? no
23) Do you have a cherished childhood teddybear? no
24) Are you psychic in any way? no
25) Are you a good dancer? no
26) Are you a good singer?no
27) Are you a good cook?no
28) Are you a good artist?yo
29) Are you a good listener? no
30) Are you a good public speaker?no
31) Are you a good babysitter?no
32) Are you a good mechanic?no
33) Are you a good diplomat?no
34) Are you a good employee?no
35) Are you a good dresser?you know it gurl
36) Are you a good swimmer?no
37) Are you a good skier?no
38) Are you a good lover?no
39) Are you a good musician?no
40) Are you a good comedian?no
41) Are you a good cleaner?no
42) Are you a good actor?always
43) Are you a good writer?moo
44) Have you ever been bungee jumping? no
45) Have you ever been canoeing/kayaking?no
46) What types of holidays do you prefer? no school
47) Whats the furthest you've ever been on holiday? church
48) What was your favourite holiday? was?
49) Where would your dream holiday be? no
50) Can you tap dance? no
51) Whats your favourite zoo animal? duck
52) Whats your favourite sport? hakey
53) Whats your favourite food? spooghheti 
54) Whats your favourite pizza topping? cheese
55) Whats your favourite film? AKEELAH AND THE BEE BZZZZZZ BZZZZZZ
56) Whats your favourite song? BZZ BZZ
57) Whats your favourite alcoholic drink?  somersby
58) Whats your favourite non-alcoholic drink? lemonade
59) Whats your favourite TV program? GOSSIP GIRL
60) Whats your favourite boyband? ?????
61) Whats your favourite girl group? ?????
62) What would be your ideal partner? ?????
63) Do you want children? ?????
64) Do you want a church wedding? ?????
65) Are you religious? ?????
66) Do you like reality TV programs? does gossip girl count?
67) Do you like TV talent shows? gossip girl
68) If you were gay who would your life partner be? Beyonce
69) If you could go back in time to change one thing what would it be? more seasons of gossip girl+ better ending of HIMYM
70) How many hats do you own? too many
71) Are you any good at pool? what
72) Whats the highest you've ever jumped into the water from? mmm idk how tall
73) Have you ever been admitted to hospital? birth
74) Have you ever had any brushes with the law? everyday
75) Have you ever been on TV? actually yeah
76) Have you ever met any celebrities? sorta
77) Have you ever been to Legoland? no
78) Have you ever done something heroic? no
79) Have you ever played a practical joke on anyone? never :^)
80) Have you ever been the recipiant of a practical joke? recipient**
81) What would be your best achievement to date? a person 
82) Do you prefer baths or showers? lush bath bomb
83) Do you prefer towel drying, blow drying or natural dryin your hair? drying*
84) Have you ever built a snowman? if you haven't sucks to suck
85) Have you ever been sledging? sure
86) Have you ever flown a kite? sure
87) What colour socks are you wearing? no socks no problem
88) If you could live anywhere, where would that be? ocean bc im a mermaid
89) Have you ever been famous? oh yeah
90) Would you like to be a big celebrity? sure
91) Would you ever go on Big Brother? no?
92) How big is your TV? xl 
93) What is your most essential appliance? cotton candy maker
94) What type of music do you like? mainstream indie :^)
95) Have you ever been skinnydipping? no
96) How many Pillows do you sleep with? 5
97) What position do you often sleep in? idk im sleeping
98) What do you wear to bed? clothes
99) How big is your house? technically three stories i guess
100) Do you prefer sunrises or sunsets? sunsets :^)
101) What do you typically have for breakfast? nothing
102) Do you like scary movies? yeah
103) Whats your favourite Milkshake flavour? strawbuuuurrry
104) Have you ever been in a newspaper? yeah
105) How long can you balance on one foot? forever
106) Have you ever fired a gun? no even though i'm canadian
107) Have you ever tried archery? yes
108) Whats your favourite condement? ketchup
109) Whats your favourite clean word? bubbles
110) Whats your favourite swear word? bubbles
111) Whats your least favourite word? mooch24
112) What was the last film you saw? the best of me
113) What football team do you support? broncos
114) Whats the longest you've gone without sleep? not very long like 1 day
115) Whats the tallest building you've ever been up? idk
116) Do you have any scars? yes
117) Do you like marmite? sounds bad
118) Did you ever win any sportsday events?yA
119) What did you want to be when you grew up? rich
120) If you could change anything about yourself what would it be? longer hair
121) Whats the longest you've ever grown your hair? belly button
123) Are you scared of flying? no
124) Would you rather trade some intelligence for looks or looks for intelligence? intelligence for looks. you wont be successful with intelligence but you have a chance with looks
125) Have you ever tie-dyed your own clothes? no
126) How often do you buy new clothes? every month or twice a month
127) Are you reliable? yeah
128) Are you proud of yourself? ya im awesome
129) Have you ever had a secret admirer? :^)
130) If you could ask your future self one question what would it be? what went wrong?
131) Do you hold grudges? yep :)
132) If you could breed two animals together to defy the laws of nature what new animal would you create? baby whale
133) Do you decorate the outside of your house for christmas? YA
134) Can you solve sudoko puzzles? no
135) Have you ever played conkers? no
136) Whats the most unusual conversation you've ever had? idk
137) Are you much of a gambler? totally
138) Are you much of a daredevil? totally
139) Are you a good liar? totally
140) Are you a good judge of character? totally
141) Are you any good at charades? ew charades
142) How long could you go without talking? not long
143) What has been your worst haircut/style? in kindergarten i cut off my bangs
144) Can you iceskate? i'm Canadian of course i can
145) Can you summersault?yes
146) Whats your favourite joke? my brother
147) Whats been your best present?doggies aw<3
148) Whats been your worst present? my little brother ducks
149) Have you ever sleepwalked? no
150) Can you build a house of cards? no

replies.body:
Why do we dream?








Gratz on Jr. Mod btw!!    Sorry im 3 months too late though :((





rip ur Jr Mod
replies.body_tagged:
Why do we dream?








Gratz on Jr. Mod btw!!    Sorry im 3 months too late though :((





rip ur Jr Mod

replies.body:
Our dreams mystify us and often leave us waking up confused, disoriented, frightened, or perhaps very, very satisfied. Freud, of course, proposed that our dreams represent unconscious  wishes that we’re afraid to express in our waking life. The most recent explanations aren’t totally incompatible with this theory.  According to the activation-synthesis model dreams are stories that we create out of the random stimulation that occurs in the brain while we sleep. The updated activation-integration-modulation (AIM) model proposes that dreams reflect the activity of regions of the brain active at a particular moment as well as the activity of particular neurotransmitters. This neuroscience explanation regards the stories we make up as reflecting, in part, our hidden desires, but they are not primarily the products of repressed wishes.




Thanks! Means a lot!

replies.body: This is more of an orientation of you presenting yourself, rather than asking questions. You are more or less showing this as a spam topic. If you want to share those questions and answers, please put them on your "About" tab on your profile.
